effect.x_y: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Targets the last opposing Pokémon to hit the user with a damaging move this turn. Inflicts 1.5× the damage that move did to the user. If there is no eligible target, this move will fail. Type immunity applies, but other type effects are ignored.

short_effect.x_y: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Strikes back at the last Pokémon to hit the user this turn with 1.5× the damage.

flavor_text.x_y: The user retaliates with much greater power against the target that last inflicted damage on it.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user retaliates with much greater power against the opponent that last inflicted damage on it.
